trans-unit.source: Defines an MSBuild task that generates the section of an application manifest that describes an Office add-in.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个 MSBuild 任务，该任务生成描述 Office 加载项的应用程序清单部分。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Set all the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeAddInManifest> properties and then call <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeAddInManifest.Execute%2A> to run this task.
trans-unit.target: 设置所有<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeAddInManifest>属性，然后调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeAddInManifest.Execute%2A>若要运行此任务。

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Build Engine uses <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks> to build and deploy Office solutions.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Build Engine 使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks>生成和部署 Office 解决方案。

trans-unit.source: However, you can create your own build system by using these classes and the MSBuild XML-based project files.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可以使用这些类并基于 MSBuild XML 项目文件来创建你自己生成系统。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [MSBuild Reference](~/msbuild/msbuild-reference.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[MSBuild 参考](~/msbuild/msbuild-reference.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeAddInManifest" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeAddInManifest" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the project description.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置项目说明。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the project description.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.String" />表示项目说明。

trans-unit.source: Generates the section of an application manifest that describes an Office add-in.
trans-unit.target: 生成描述 Office 加载项的应用程序清单部分。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the Office solutions in Visual Studio section of an application manifest that describes an add-in was generated successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功生成描述加载项的应用程序清单 Visual Studio 部分中的 Office 解决方案，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets information about the form regions in the customization assembly.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置有关自定义程序集中表单区域的信息。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" /> objects that represents information about the form regions in the customization assembly.
trans-unit.target: 数组<see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" />表示有关自定义项程序集中的窗体区域的信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alternative name of the project.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置项目的备用名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the alternative name of the project.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.String" />表示项目的备用名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeAddInManifest.FriendlyName%2A> property must be assigned before <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeAddInManifest.Execute%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeAddInManifest.FriendlyName%2A>属性必须之前分配<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeAddInManifest.Execute%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the registry key, which is the default add-in name.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置注册表项的名称，该名称为默认的加载项名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the name of the registry key, which is the default add-in name.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> ，它表示注册表项，这是默认的外接程序名称的名称。

trans-unit.source: This is the registry key that will be used by the application to load the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 这是应用程序将用于加载外接程序的注册表项。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Registry Entries for VSTO Add-ins](/visualstudio/vsto/registry-entries-for-vsto-add-ins.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[VSTO 外接程序的注册表项](/visualstudio/vsto/registry-entries-for-vsto-add-ins.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeAddInManifest.KeyName%2A> property must be assigned before <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeAddInManifest.Execute%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeAddInManifest.KeyName%2A>属性必须之前分配<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeAddInManifest.Execute%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the load behavior.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置加载行为。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that specifies the load behavior.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> ，它指定加载行为。

trans-unit.source: If the value is 2, the add-in is disconnected or disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为 2 外, 接程序是断开连接或禁用。

trans-unit.source: If the value is 3, the add-in is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为 3，则启用外接程序。

trans-unit.source: For a list of load behavior values, see [Registry Entries for VSTO Add-ins](/visualstudio/vsto/registry-entries-for-vsto-add-ins.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关负载行为值的列表，请参阅[VSTO 外接程序的注册表项](/visualstudio/vsto/registry-entries-for-vsto-add-ins.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeAddInManifest.LoadBehavior%2A> property must be assigned before <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeAddInManifest.Execute%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeAddInManifest.LoadBehavior%2A>属性必须之前分配<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeAddInManifest.Execute%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the Microsoft Office application that is running the current add-in.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置运行当前加载项的 Microsoft Office 应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the name of the Microsoft Office application that is running the current add-in.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> ，它表示的当前外接程序运行的 Microsoft Office 应用程序名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeAddInManifest.OfficeApplication%2A> property must be assigned before <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeAddInManifest.Execute%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeAddInManifest.OfficeApplication%2A>属性必须之前分配<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeAddInManifest.Execute%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the section of an application manifest that describes an Office add-in.
trans-unit.target: 获取描述 Office 加载项的应用程序清单部分。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" /> that represents the Office solutions in Visual Studio section of an application manifest file that describes an add-in.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" />表示 Visual Studio 部分介绍外接程序的应用程序清单文件中的 Office 解决方案。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.String" />。
